Key Match Events: Draymond Green recorded a game-high five blocks, four of which on Pelicans' star forward Zion Williamson
Post-Match Reflections: Head Coach Steve Kerr said, 'He's still one of the best defenders in the world, that's for sure.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Warriors have the second-best defensive rating in the league (98.4)
Others: Draymond Green believes his name remains in the conversation among the league's best defenders
